External API

External source API that is used to get the latest currency rates.

ExternalAPIBase

class ext_api.ext_api_interface.ExternalAPIBase

Bases: ABC

Base class for implementing an external API source for currency rates.

abstract formatted_rates(raw_rates: Union[Dict[str, str], str]) → Dict[str, Any]

Get rates formatted as currency_code:rate from the external source API for currency rates.

Parameters

raw_rates (required) – Dictionary containing the currency:rate pairs or a string, depending on the API source for currency rates.

Returns

dict or str

abstract property params: Dict[str, str]

URL parameters for the external API source for currency rates.

Returns

str

abstract property url: str

URL for the external API source for currency rates.

Returns

str

ExchangeRateAPI

class ext_api.exchange_rate.ExchangeRateAPI(url: Optional[str] = None)

Bases: ExternalAPIBase

Class to access currency rates from Exchange Rate API

formatted_rates(raw_rates: Any) → Dict[str, Any]

Get rates formatted as currency_code:rate from the Exchange Rate API.

Parameters

Returns

dict or str

CurrencyRatesDownloader

class ext_api.rates_downloader.CurrencyRatesDownloader(ext_api: ExternalAPIBase, max_retries: int = 5, time_out: int = 5, increment_timeout: int = 5)

Bases: object

Generic downloader that accepts an instance of object based on ExternalAPIBase.

Retries retrieval of currency rates from the external API source upon failure, with configurable options to retrying.

Parameters

  • ext_api (required) – ExternalAPIBase

  • max_retries (optional) – Maximum number of retrial attempts, default=5

  • time_out (optional) – Initial time out for retrials in seconds, each time a failure occurs, this is incremented by increment_timeout, default=5 seconds.

  • increment_timeout (optional) – Number of seconds to increment for each subsequent attempt, default=5 seconds

add_headers(headers: Dict[str, Any]) → None

Add additional headers before sending request to the external API, if required.

Parameters

headers (required) – dict of header key:value pairs

Returns

None

get_rates() → Dict[str, Any]

Get rates from the external source API for currency rates.

Returns

dict containing the currency:rate pairs from the external source API for currency rates.
